title: Achievements
description: Schema for achievement definition files stored in S3.

achievements.description: List of achievement definitions in this theme file.

description.description: User-facing description of how the achievement is earned.

theme.description: Theme identifier this achievement belongs to (e.g., exploration).

rank.description: Optional rank for theme meta-achievements (BRONZE, SILVER, GOLD).

trigger.description: Short description of the triggering action or rule.

restriction.description: Access restriction level (NONE, TIER_1, REGION, UNAVAILABLE).
